title: Daniel James reveals text from Ryan Giggs after completing Man Utd transfer
text:
Ryan Giggs contacted Daniel James after he completed his move to Manchester United (Picture: Getty)

Daniel James has revealed he received a text message from Ryan Giggs after completing his move to Manchester United in the summer.

Wales winger James joined Premier League giants United for £15million in June and was one of three new additions in Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s squad, along with Harry Maguire and Aaron Wan-Bissaka.

The 21-year-old has made a superb start to his career at Old Trafford and scored three goals in his first four appearances for Manchester United despite the team’s poor start to the season.

Red Devils legend Giggs gave James his international debut last year and contacted the Manchester United man after he joined his former club.

James said: ‘Ryan gave me my debut for Wales. I’m grateful for that. He obviously believed in me.

‘When I came here I think he spoke to the manager. And wjen I signed he gave me a text just saying: “Be yourself.” That’s what I’ll do.’

James enjoyed a dream start to his Premier League career, scoring just seven minutes into his debut in Manchester United’s 4-0 win over Chelsea on the opening weekend of the season.

And the Welshman added: ‘I came on at 3-0, I made that same run a few times and finally got the ball and scored. It was pure emotion.

‘When you come to a new club you want to contribute with goals and assists. Getting that goal really helped me.’

On being a Manchester United star and playing under Solskjaer, James said: ‘I’m loving it. Every training session he’s trying to make me better.

‘He wants me to go at players and be positive. I didn’t come here to be a squad player but Ole has really showed faith in me.’

Manchester United, currently 12th in the Premier League, face unbeaten leaders Liverpool on Sunday afternoon.
